cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshiki

sentence.kanji: ここは景色がきれいですね。
sentence.romaji: koko ha keshiki ga kirei desu ne
sentence.english: The scenery here is beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiiro

sentence.kanji: 信号は黄色でした。
sentence.romaji: shingou ha kiiro deshita
sentence.english: The traffic light was yellow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoko

sentence.kanji: 横の長さは1メートルです。
sentence.romaji: yoko no nagasa ha ichime-toru desu
sentence.english: Its width is one meter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokogaki

sentence.kanji: この本は横書きです。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha yokogaki desu
sentence.english: This book is printed horizontally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oudanhodou

sentence.kanji: あそこに横断歩道があります。
sentence.romaji: asoko ni oudanhodou ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a crosswalk over there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunbougu

sentence.kanji: 新しい文房具を買いました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii bunbougu wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought some new stationery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisaku

sentence.kanji: 一緒に対策を考えましょう。
sentence.romaji: isho ni taisaku wo kangaemashou
sentence.english: Let's think together about what measures we'll take.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's midoriiro

sentence.kanji: 彼は緑色のジャケットを着ています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha midoriiro no jaketo wo kite imasu
sentence.english: He's wearing a green jacket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taihen

sentence.kanji: 大変なことが起こりました。
sentence.romaji: taihen na koto ga okorimashita
sentence.english: A terrible thing happened.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reibun

sentence.kanji: 例文を3つ作ってください。
sentence.romaji: reibun wo mitsu tsukute kudasai
sentence.english: Please make three example sentences.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koibito

sentence.kanji: 彼は恋人を失った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koibito wo ushinata
sentence.english: He lost his girlfriend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mezurashii

sentence.kanji: 昨日珍しい果物を食べました。
sentence.romaji: kinou mezurashii kudamono wo tabemashita
sentence.english: I ate some unusual fruit yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moji

sentence.kanji: 壁に文字が書いてあった。
sentence.romaji: kabe ni moji ga kaite ata
sentence.english: There was some writing on the wall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haiiro

sentence.kanji: 今日の空は灰色だ。
sentence.romaji: kyou no sora ha haiiro da
sentence.english: The sky's gray today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akachan

sentence.kanji: ベッドで赤ちゃんが眠っています。
sentence.romaji: bedo de akachan ga nemute imasu
sentence.english: The baby's sleeping in the bed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zetaini

sentence.kanji: 絶対に駄目です。
sentence.romaji: zetaini dame desu
sentence.english: Absolutely not.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunshou

sentence.kanji: 彼は文章がとてもうまい。
sentence.romaji: kare ha bunshou ga totemo umai
sentence.english: His writing is very good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katachi

sentence.kanji: その椅子は変わった形をしている。
sentence.romaji: sono isu ha kawata katachi wo shite iru
sentence.english: That chair has an unusual shape.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akaji

sentence.kanji: 私たちの会社は今月は赤字よ。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi no kaisha ha kongetsu ha akaji yo
sentence.english: Our company is in deficit this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunpou

sentence.kanji: 今日は英語の文法を勉強します。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha eigo no bunpou wo benkyou shimasu
sentence.english: I'll study English grammar today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumaseru

sentence.kanji: 昼ごはんは簡単に済ませましょう。
sentence.romaji: hirugohan ha kantan ni sumasemashou
sentence.english: Let's have a quick lunch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's henkou

sentence.kanji: 予定が変更になりました。
sentence.romaji: yotei ga henkou ni narimashita
sentence.english: The schedule has been changed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunmei

sentence.kanji: 多くの文明は川の近くで始まった。
sentence.romaji: ooku no bunmei ha kawa no chikaku de hajimata
sentence.english: A lot of civilizations started by a river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakyoku

sentence.kanji: 薬局で目薬を買いました。
sentence.romaji: yakyoku de megusuri wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought some eye drops at the drugstore.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsuru

sentence.kanji: 水面に月が映っているね。
sentence.romaji: minamo ni tsuki ga utsute iru ne
sentence.english: The moon is reflected in the surface of the water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikei

sentence.kanji: ここはなだらかな地形です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha nadaraka na chikei desu
sentence.english: The landscape here features gentle slopes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumasu

sentence.kanji: 宿題を済ませてから遊びなさい。
sentence.romaji: shukudai wo sumasete kara asobinasai 。
sentence.english: Play after you finish doing your homework.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumu

sentence.kanji: 父の手術が無事に済みました。
sentence.romaji: chichi no shujutsu ga buji ni sumimashita
sentence.english: My father's operation came off without a hitch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eibun

sentence.kanji: 彼女は英文の手紙を書きました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha eibun no tegami wo kakimashita
sentence.english: She wrote an English letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bungakusha

sentence.kanji: 彼は有名な文学者です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuumei na bungakusha desu
sentence.english: He's a famous literati.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's barairo

sentence.kanji: 彼女の人生はばら色だったの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no jinsei ha barairo data no 。
sentence.english: Her life was rosy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiwa

sentence.kanji: 親子の対話は大切だよ。
sentence.romaji: oyako no taiwa ha taisetsu da yo
sentence.english: Conversation between parents and children is important.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsui

sentence.kanji: このズボンは上着と対になっています。
sentence.romaji: kono zubon ha uwagi to tsui ni nate imasu
sentence.english: This pair of trousers and this jacket go together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honbun

sentence.kanji: 本文をよく読んで答えてください。
sentence.romaji: honbun wo yoku yonde kotaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please read the text carefully and answer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokushoku

sentence.kanji: その学校の教育は特色がありますね。
sentence.romaji: sono gakou no kyouiku ha tokushoku ga arimasu ne
sentence.english: The education system at that school is unique.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keizaiteki

sentence.kanji: 経済的な効果は計り知れません。
sentence.romaji: keizaiteki na kouka ha hakari shiremasen
sentence.english: The economic effects are immeasurable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keishikiteki

sentence.kanji: 彼は形式的な質問をしただけだった。
sentence.romaji: kare ha keishikiteki na shitsumon wo shita dake data
sentence.english: He only asked formal questions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunkateki

sentence.kanji: この国は文化的な事業に力を入れています。
sentence.romaji: kono kuni ha bunkateki na jigyou ni chikara wo irete imasu
sentence.english: This country is putting efforts into cultural projects.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taitou

sentence.kanji: その子供は大人と対等に話していたよ。
sentence.romaji: sono kodomo ha otona to taitou ni hanashite ita yo
sentence.english: That kid was speaking with an adult as an equal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's megusuri

sentence.kanji: 目が疲れたので目薬をさしたよ。
sentence.romaji: me ga tsukareta no de megusuri wo sashita yo
sentence.english: Because my eyes were tired, I put in some eye drops.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bun

sentence.kanji: この文は意味が分かりません。
sentence.romaji: kono bun ha imi ga wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't understand the meaning of this sentence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouritsu

sentence.kanji: 作業の効率を上げるにはどうしたらいいですか。
sentence.romaji: sagyou no kouritsu wo ageru ni ha dou shitara ii desu ka
sentence.english: How should we increase efficiency at work?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakuritsu

sentence.kanji: 天気予報は当たる確率が高くなりましたね。
sentence.romaji: tenki yohou ha ataru kakuritsu ga takaku narimashita ne
sentence.english: The chance that the weather forecast is right has increased.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keisotsu

sentence.kanji: 軽率な発言はしないよう気をつけなさい。
sentence.romaji: keisotsu na hatsugen ha shinai you ki wo tsukenasai
sentence.english: Take care not to make flippant remarks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sochoku

sentence.kanji: 率直なご意見ありがとうございました。
sentence.romaji: sochoku na goiken arigatou gozaimashita
sentence.english: Thank you for your straightforward opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaki

sentence.kanji: 私が好きな楽器はギターです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga suki na gaki ha gita- desu
sentence.english: My favorite instrument is the guitar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanei

sentence.kanji: 新型車に研究の成果が反映されています。
sentence.romaji: shingatasha ni kenkyuu no seika ga hanei sarete imasu
sentence.english: The results of our research are reflected in the new model.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ritsu

sentence.kanji: その手術の成功率は90%だそうです。
sentence.romaji: sono shujutsu no seikouritsu ha 90% da sou desu
sentence.english: Apparently, the success rate of the operation is 90 %.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seihoukei

sentence.kanji: 正方形の紙を用意しましょう。
sentence.romaji: seihoukei no kami wo youi shimashou
sentence.english: Prepare a square of paper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouraku

sentence.kanji: 秋は行楽にいい季節ですね。
sentence.romaji: aki ha kouraku ni ii kisetsu desu ne
sentence.english: Autumn is a good season for excursions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aikawarazu

sentence.kanji: 彼は相変わらず忙しいですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha aikawarazu isogashii desu ne
sentence.english: He is busy as usual.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaoiro

sentence.kanji: 彼は顔色がよくありませんね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaoiro ga yoku arimasen ne 。
sentence.english: His face looks pale.
